Name: progressive familial intrahepatic cholestasis
Definition: An intrahepatic cholestasis characterized by early onset of chronic unremitting cholestasis of hepatocellular origin that progresses to hepatic fibrosis

Name: intrahepatic cholestasis of pregnancy
Definition: An intrahepatic cholestasis characterized by reversible cholestasis typically occurring in the second or third trimester of pregnancy

Name: benign recurrent intrahepatic cholestasis
Definition: An intrahepatic cholestasis characterized by intermittent
